timeline.message:
HBASE-25199 Remove deprecated HStore#getStoreHomedir methods

Remove the deprecated methods HStore#getStoreHomedir(Path, RegionInfo,
byte[]) and HStore#getStoreHomedir(Path, String, byte[]).

timeline.bodyText: I think we should have a replacement of this method, instead of replacing the caller with the code of this method directly just like an inline?
